title: List Content Standards Request
description: Request parameters for listing content standards configurations

channels.description: Filter by channel (display, video, audio, ctv, etc.)

countries.description: Filter by ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes

include_drafts.description: Include draft standards with no effective_date (default: false)

effective_before.description: Filter to standards effective before this date (ISO 8601)

effective_after.description: Filter to standards effective after this date (ISO 8601)
